title: Qualification Report for the {gsm} R Packages
text: Risk-Based Quality Monitoring (RBQM) proactive approach clinical trial monitoring focuses identifying addressing critical risks integrity study data patient safety. approach aims ensure study data accurate, reliable, credible optimizing use resources minimizing burden study sites. {gsm} suite R packages supports RBQM performing risk assessments primarily focused detecting differences quality site level. approach intended detect potential issues related critical data process(es) across major risk categories safety, efficacy, disposition, treatment, general quality. category consists one risk assessment(s). risk assessment analyzes data flag sites potential outliers provides visualization help user understand issue.

title: Qualification Report for the {gsm} R Packages
text: Qualification testing ensures core functions execute expected system-wide scale. Qualification includes executing various functional, performance, usability testing. Qualification tests designed provide developers repeatable process easy update document. document summarizes qualification testing performed gsm functions essential analysis workflow.

title: Qualification Report for the {gsm} R Packages
text: essential gsm workflow function independently qualified using specifications test cases compiled report. Details provided .

title: Qualification Report for the {gsm} R Packages
text: Specifications capture critical use cases given function. function must least one (1) specification, specification must least one (1) associated test case. Multiple specifications may exist function, multiple test cases may exist specification. specification includes following components: Description: outlines use case specification Risk Assessment Risk Level: assigned value “Low”, “Medium”, “High”, corresponding risk associated specification failing Risk Impact: assigned value “Low”, “Medium”, “High”, corresponding severity impact associated specification failing Test Cases: lists measurable test cases associated specification

title: Qualification Report for the {gsm} R Packages
text: Test cases translate specifications testable scripts confirm package functions meet established requirements. Test cases represent user may utilize function help identify code gaps support testing automation. Test cases gsm packages written using standard testthat workflow. single test script saved test case named following convention test_qual_{TestID}.R, TestID test case number. Test code within scripts written clearly concisely facilitate quick execution interpretability. Note single test case may associated multiple specifications.

title: Qualification Workflow
text: Qualification repository done ensure package functioning intended core functions execute expected system-wide scale. unit tests also written test code, qualification testing used test expected behaviors happening correctly. Qualification done using set machine-readable documents associated functions create strong documentation structure well cohesive qualification report. qualification process modified add new assessments updated whenever updates affect workflows tested qualification tests. Qualification tests designed provide developers repeatable process easy update document.

title: Qualification Workflow
text: gsm assessment independently qualified using Specifications Test Cases, compiled Qualification Report. Specifications - expected behaviors tested. Test Cases - testable pieces code associated Specifications. Qualification Report - Summary snapshot qualification activity.

title: Qualification Workflow
text: Specifications capture important use cases given function. function must least one (1) specification, specification must least one (1) associated test case. Multiple specifications may exist function, multiple test cases may exist specification. Specification include following components: Description - Outlines use case specification. Risk Level - Risk Level can “Low,” “Medium,” “High,” corresponding risk associated specification failing. Risk Impact - Risk Impact can “Low,” “Medium,” “High,” corresponding severity impact associated specification failing. Test Cases - list test cases associated specification. specifications (including Description, Risk Level, Risk Impact) documented qualification_specs.csv, rendered Qualification Report, documented later section. example, first specification qualification_specs.csv written :

title: Qualification Workflow
text: Test cases translate specifications testable scripts confirm package functions meet established requirements. Test cases representative user may utilize function help identify code gaps support testing automation. Test cases linked assessment shown . Test cases written using standard testthat workflow saved tests/testqualification/qualification. test case saved individual file named using convention test_qual_{TestID}.R, TestID corresponds test case number. Test code within scripts written clearly concisely facilitate quick execution, review, interpretation. Test cases also informative description outline tested. Note test cases can associated multiple specifications. example, S1_1 includes tests (T1_1, T1_2, T1_3) AE_Assess function performed properly Poisson method. tests (T1_1, T1_2, T1_3) tests whether Poisson method output accurate data grouped different grouping variable (Site, Study, Custom, respectively). addition, input data T1_1 T1_2 subset larger dataframe, thus T1_1 T1_2 also test whether AE_Assess function performs appropriately provided subset input data, satisfies spec S1_6. simple example test case shown . test case file called test_qual_T21_1.R correspond T21_1 specifications:

text: overview qualification test results presented table, one row function tested. results presented series columns number tests, number passing tests, number failing tests, number skipped tests.

title: Qualification Workflow
text: detailed summary qualification test results also provided table format Qualification Report. section, two tables presented, first presents row corresponding single specification second presents row corresponding single test. One Row Per Specification - row corresponds specification, specification presented general description functionality tested specification, along risk level, risk impact, associated test IDs. cases, multiple test IDs associated specification. One Row Per Test - row corresponds single test (Test ID), test presented function tested, specification IDs test satisfies, detailed test description (including grouping variables function arguments tested), result test (Pass/Fail/Skip).
